page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: In this area five Ch. of Scotland:- 1. Cambusnethan Old{ (GR.806554) 2. Cambusnethan North{(GR.807554) 3. Coltness Memorial{ (GR.819558) 4. St Mark's{ (GR.802566) 5. Morningside Hall{ (GR.833552). Two Roman Catholic Churches:- 1. St Aidain's {(GR.802563) 2. St Brigits {(GR.823561). and a Gospel Hall at Newmains {(GR.825561).} At the moment it is the 25th Anniversary of St Mark's and St Aidain's (both in Coltness- NW of the area). They are having joint celebrations including a concert given by Coltness High School Concert Band and the North British Steel Choir.
